outline:
1. to hide, treasure, treasure or store up
    1. (Qal)
      1. to hide, treasure, treasure up
      2. to lie hidden, lurk
    2. (Niphal) to be hidden, be stored up
    3. (Hiphil) to hide, hide from discovery
kjv_def: esteem, hide(-den one, self), lay up, lurk (be set) privily, (keep) secret(-ly, place).
strongs_def: to hide (by covering over); by implication, to hoard or reserve; figuratively to deny; specifically (favorably) to protect, (unfavorably) to lurk
